name: Young Bronze Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 80 ft. flying, 40 ft. swimming
description: The Young Bronze Dragon has gleaming bronze scales, showcasing its noble appearance. It is a large creature capable of flying and swimming with ease.
memorable: Known for its lightning breath weapon and ability to transform into other forms, it acts as a guardian of coastal areas.
goals: To promote peace and justice, often aiding sailors and coastal settlements.
relations: May ally with good-aligned adventurers and interact positively with mortals.
environment: Coastal regions or near large bodies of water.
strengths: Highly intelligent with strong offensive and defensive capabilities; immune to lightning damage.
weaknesses: Can be overwhelmed by coordinated attacks due to focus on lightning abilities.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack returning to bite and claw or breath weapons like Lightning Breath and Repulsion Breath.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Breath causes significant lightning damage along a long line; Repulsion Breath creates a push effect.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 ft.; passive Perception of 17 enhances its detection capabilities.
skills: Possesses solid skills in Insight, Perception, and Stealth.
additional_information: Amphibious nature allows breathing both air and water.
Oracle of the Coast ability predicts weather accurately up to seven days.
Innate spellcasting for tactical advantages with fog cloud and speak with animals.
Lightning Extraction can impair nearby foes after using its breath weapon.
Change Shape ability enables transformation into humanoid or beast forms.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with the ability to cast fog cloud and speak with animals.
test_queries: bronze dragon that can swim and fly
amphibious dragon known for lightning attacks
dragon that transforms into humanoid form
